2.2.name: wordpress/blogroll-rss-widget
2.2.description:
This Wordpress Widget allows you to display the recent posts of your blogroll links via RSS Feeds as a sidebar widget. The Plugin works without Javascript and without AJAX. It uses the Wordpress standard links database and honors the visible and target settings as defined for each link (private links are not shown, links are displayed in the same or in a new window as specified). The Plugin is easy to install, the Widget is simple to use and highly customizable. You can simply switch on / off, select or type in the various configurations and settings.

You can configure this Widget in the Wordpress Appearance Widgets SubPanel as follows:

  • add an own title to the sidebar widget
  • define how many items you want to display
  • choose the link category of the items (all links or one of your link categories)
